The background is a blurry neutral tan color, presumably a wall or room. The camera angle is a close-up shot, focusing primarily on his face and upper torso.
actions: The only action performed is the man speaking directly to the camera. There are minor facial expressions and slight head movements as he talks, indicating he is engaged in a conversation or monologue.
